In online marketing, it is a fact you need to know how to do keyword research to reach your goals. For this reason, keyword tools are very helpful but yet many of them do not give you the appropriate amount of data that you need. Spotting this issue, Brad Callen released his Niche Finder program which we'll now evaluate.

Brad Callen has a track record in the marketplace for producing tools that streamline the many tasks involved with succeeding online and his Niche Finder software program aims to do the same. A formidable challenge you confront in looking for your ideal keywords is the fact that it can take a long time to collect the data and decide which keywords to target. This simple tool helps you keep your focus on site marketing and advertising and making money by providing a single interface that includes everything you need to get your key phrase research done.

After entering the initial keyword, Niche Finder delivers easy to grasp results. When trying to obtain a top Google ranking for a particular keyword, there are lots of things to take into account. This tool is very beneficial in gathering information such as backlinks as well as page rank. The colors green, yellow, and red are used to help you evaluate the futility of competing with a particular keyword phrase.

Within the results is some vital information including global and local search numbers and the numbers of competitive sites for the specific keyword term. If you are a seasoned niche marketer, you can use this information to work with your own particular formula for assessing keyword effectiveness. The cost per click figures are also shown and these are needed when building adsense sites to ensure you have a chance of making enough money from clicks to make it worthwhile.

One item that will really help you save much more time is the domain availability columns alongside each keyword. It is typically accepted that sites rank better with exact match domains but usually you have to spend a lot of time manually checking with a domain registrar to find an available domain name. Being able to see the availability of the important domain extensions accelerates the process considerably. If the exact match domain names will not be available, the software proposes other possible relevant domain names.
